segments.text: Hi , Nancy . How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Tom . Want a cup of coffee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not right now . I've got to get another car and my old one is blown up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hey , did you look in the classified ads ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yeah , but I'd be getting somebody else's problems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh huh . How about a used car ? They've got good ones now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the same kind of deal though , you know , you never know what you're going to get .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hey , how about a new car ? They've got easy loans now . You'd feel so good driving a new car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's look at them all . Have you got a paper there ?
segments.speaker: S1
